author: craigmcc
msg: - Make ActionForm serializable so that Struts-based applications can be
used in servlet containers that enforce "distributable" semantics.
- Change reset() method signature so that it receives the mapping
selecting this bean and the request object, to provide context for
making property reset decisions in multi-page forms.
- Skip input form validation if there is no input attribute defined in
- Skip input form validation if the Cancel key was pressed to submit

author: craigmcc
msg: Make PropertyUtils.copyProperties() skip properties for which the origin
bean has a getter method but the destination bean has no setter method.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add the missing logic to generate event handler and style related

author: craigmcc
msg: Store the exception we are about to throw as a request attribute.

author: craigmcc
msg: Don't meddle with getSession unless required
